about_the_game:
The legendary Mack® Pinnacle and American Truck Simulator are the match made in heaven that you've been looking for! The Mack Pinnacle™ combines power and reliability with modern technology and a classic design. The result is a legendary workhorse, ready to take on any job while making every drop of fuel count. The Pinnacle’s lightweight-yet-strong frame is built for heavy loads, steep grades and long hauls, making it the perfect choice for your next journey in American Truck Simulator.

The Pinnacle's virtual implementation includes an array of configurations options including 3 cabin variants (Day Cab, 48-inch Flat Top Sleeper and 70-inch StandUp Sleeper) several chassis and length options (6x2, 6x2 Liftable Pusher and 6x4), 3 engine options ranging from 415hp to 505hp, and a choice of numerous transmissions are available. New with the addition of the Pinnacle is the Mack mDrive™ HD transmission, equipped with crawler gears to help get any load moving. It's complimented by a low final drive ratio to keep engine RPMs low at highway speeds to help maximize efficiency.

You'll also find plenty of customization options including 4 cabin interiors, two grille variations (modern & classic), a variety of cabin accessories and more to tune up your Mack Pinnacle™ just the way you like it.

We know how much our American Truck Simulator community has been looking forward to this addition, and we hope you enjoy it!
